column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We ordered the big boy seafood tower
column2: there were four of us there and it had the right amount of portions to accommodate all of us. The thing that set this tower apart from others I've had is how fresh everything tasted
column3: and the variety of food. It has both East coast and west coast oysters
column4: it came with every consistent you could need
column5: Â the shrimp was huge and amazing just wow wow wow. Next the main course was just as amazing. The table all ordered steak and they were prepared to our liking.
